import React from 'react' import { Row, Image, Form, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import logo from '../images/signup.png' import category1 from '../images/shopping.png' import category2 from '../images/daliy.png' import category3 from '../images/form.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCamera } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function ExpenseInput(props) { const monthNames = ["January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December" ]; console.log("inside expenseInput", props); let month = monthNames[parseInt(props.value.date.substring(5, 7))-1] console.log("this ", month); return ( <>
{month.substring(0,3)}

{props.value.date.substring(8, 10)}

{props.value.description }
User x

USD15.34

) } export default ExpenseInput
